<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[724, 220, 722, 237]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[867, 220, 905, 237]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[869, 256, 905, 272]]<|/det|> <|ref|>title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 277, 231, 294]]<|/det|> # MATHEMATICS <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[91, 302, 355, 318]]<|/det|> Paper 2 Non-calculator (Extended) <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[785, 302, 905, 318]]<|/det|> May/June 2025 <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[847, 326, 907, 341]]<|/det|> 2 hours <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 355, 395, 372]]<|/det|> You must answer on the question paper. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[93, 384, 402, 400]]<|/det|> You will need: Geometrical instruments <|ref|>title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 418, 225, 433]]<|/det|> ## INSTRUCTIONS <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 433, 294, 450]]<|/det|> - Answer all questions. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 449, 761, 467]]<|/det|> - Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 462, 808, 481]]<|/det|> - Write your name, centre number and candidate number in the boxes at the top of the page. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 478, 565, 497]]<|/det|> - Write your answer to each question in the space provided. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 495, 482, 512]]<|/det|> - Do not use an erasable pen or correction fluid. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 511, 361, 528]]<|/det|> - Do not write on any bar codes. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 526, 452, 545]]<|/det|> - Calculators must not be used in this paper. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 540, 325, 559]]<|/det|> - You may use tracing paper. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 556, 469, 575]]<|/det|> - You must show all necessary working clearly. <|ref|>title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 601, 217, 617]]<|/det|> ## INFORMATION <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 616, 397, 633]]<|/det|> - The total mark for this paper is 100. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 632, 730, 651]]<|/det|> - The number of marks for each question or part question is shown in brackets [ ].

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 121, 367, 138]]<|/det|>
Area, \(A\), of triangle, base \(b\), height \(h\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 115, 682, 146]]<|/det|>
\[
A=\frac{1}{2} b h
\]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 166, 672, 184]]<|/det|>
\[
A=\pi r^{2}
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 170, 308, 185]]<|/det|>
Area, \(A\), of circle of radius \(r\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 219, 385, 234]]<|/det|>
Circumference, \(C\), of circle of radius \(r\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 219, 672, 233]]<|/det|>
\[
C=2 \pi r
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 267, 515, 284]]<|/det|>
Curved surface area, \(A\), of cylinder of radius \(r\), height \(h\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 265, 686, 281]]<|/det|>
\[
A=2 \pi r h
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 314, 537, 331]]<|/det|>
Curved surface area, \(A\), of cone of radius \(r\), sloping edge \(l\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 314, 672, 330]]<|/det|>
\[
A=\pi r l
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 363, 373, 379]]<|/det|>
Surface area, \(A\), of sphere of radius \(r\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 359, 682, 378]]<|/det|>
\[

\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 410, 490, 426]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 408, 664, 426]]<|/det|>
\[
V=A l
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 456, 435, 474]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 449, 682, 480]]<|/det|>

V=\frac{1}{3} A h
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 507, 421, 523]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 503, 680, 521]]<|/det|>

\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 554, 396, 571]]<|/det|>
Volume, \(V\), of cone of radius \(r\), height \(h\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 546, 690, 575]]<|/det|>
\[
V=\frac{1}{3} \pi r^{2} h
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 605, 336, 620]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 595, 686, 626]]<|/det|>

\]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 736, 790, 826]]<|/det|>

\begin{aligned}
& \frac{a}{\sin A}=\frac{b}{\sin B}=\frac{c}{\sin C} \\
& a^{2}=b^{2}+c^{2}-2 b c \cos A \\
& \text { Area }=\frac{1}{2} a b \sin C
\end{aligned}
\]
